about_the_game:
Tiny Bomber is an intense and thrilling 2D vertical scrolling action game that blends roguelike elements with bullet-hell dodging gameplay. In this game, you'll control a tiny bomber, constantly moving forward, dodging dense bullets, and bombing enemies, all while honing your skills and reaction time.

A unique feature of the game is its countdown system: each run has a fixed countdown timer, and players must collect coins scattered across the map to extend their remaining time. Additionally, successfully dodging bullets triggers a boost that accelerates the scrolling, offering a fast-paced, exhilarating experience.

Tiny Bomber features charming pixel art in a cute, cartoony style, complemented by retro 8-bit music, delivering a nostalgic yet challenging gaming experience. Each run offers the opportunity for players to enhance their bomber through random upgrades and growth elements, strengthening their abilities and creating new possibilities.

Every challenge is a fresh adventure as you aim to continually improve your longest distance, ultimately facing the final boss after reaching a certain distance, proving yourself as the true victor.

Whether you enjoy the constant progress of roguelike games or the intense thrill of bullet-hell dodging, Tiny Bomber offers endless fun and excitement. Are you ready to take on the challenge?
